subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Kansas City Chiefs have agreed to a two-year contract with offensive tackle Kyle Turley, who has missed the past two seasons with a back injury. Turley, listed at 6-foot-5 and 300 pounds, tried out for the Miami Dolphins in May, after slimming down to 260 pounds and attempting to make a switch from tackle to tight end.
